Detailed Description

SPARK write object.

Abstract: write an voltage value to D/A board Acceptable input set: a=2, chan=0

Interface variables
  • PORT a "value to write to board" ;
  • PORT Output "return value of what was wrote" ;
  • PORT chan "channel number";
